verses.verse: <S%H4910>"Dominion<s%> and <S%H6343>awe<s%> belong to Him Who <S%H6213>establishes<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in His <S%H4791>heights.<s%>
"Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H3426>any<s%> <S%H4557>number<s%> to His <S%H1416>troops<s%>? And upon <S%H4310>whom<s%> does His <S%H216>light<s%> not <S%H6965>rise<s%>?
<S%H4100>"How<s%> then can a <S%H582>man<s%> be <S%H6663>just<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>? Or <S%H4100>how<s%> can he be <S%H2135>clean<s%> who is <S%H3205>born<s%> of <S%H802>woman<s%>?
<S%H2005>"If<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H166>has<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H166>brightness<s%> And the <S%H3556>stars<s%> are not <S%H2141>pure<s%> in His <S%H5869>sight,<s%>
